name: HITRUST CSF
description: HITRUST Common Security Framework for Healthcare Organizations

deliverables.title: 01.a - Access Control Policy
deliverables.description: Test access control policy implementation and enforcement
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%access control%'

deliverables.title: 01.b - User Registration
deliverables.description: Test user registration and de-registration processes

deliverables.title: 01.d - User Password Management
deliverables.description: Test password policies and credential management
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%password%' OR title LIKE '%credential%'

deliverables.title: 06.d - Data Protection in Transit
deliverables.description: Test encryption of data transmitted over networks
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%SSL%' OR title LIKE '%TLS%' OR title LIKE '%encryption%'

deliverables.title: 06.e - Data Protection at Rest
deliverables.description: Test encryption of PHI/sensitive data at rest

deliverables.title: 07.a - Network Controls
deliverables.description: Test network segmentation and security controls
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%network%' OR title LIKE '%firewall%' OR title LIKE '%segmentation%'

deliverables.title: 10.a - Vulnerability Management
deliverables.description: Identify technical vulnerabilities and missing patches
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE severity IN ('critical', 'high')

deliverables.title: 10.m - Application Security
deliverables.description: Test web applications for OWASP vulnerabilities
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' OR title LIKE '%XSS%' OR title LIKE '%injection%'

deliverables.title: 09.a - Audit Logging
deliverables.description: Test audit logging and monitoring implementation

deliverables.title: 09.d - Security Monitoring
deliverables.description: Test security event monitoring and alerting

deliverables.title: 08.b - Malware Protection
deliverables.description: Test anti-malware controls and endpoint protection

deliverables.title: 11.a - Incident Response
deliverables.description: Test incident response plan and procedures

deliverables.title: 12.a - Mobile Device Security
deliverables.description: Test mobile device management and security policies

deliverables.title: 13.a - Third Party Management
deliverables.description: Test security of third party connections and BAAs

deliverables.title: 14.a - Business Continuity
deliverables.description: Test business continuity and disaster recovery plans
